title: Kid Made Modern On the Go Coloring Set
description:
Creating doesn’t have to stop the minute you hit the road. With the On-The-Go Coloring Kit, you can take your supplies with you and color wherever and whenever you like. Everything nestles perfectly into the printed houndstooth canvas tote that zips closed and features a convenient carrying handle. Perfect for vacations, long car rides or to keep small hands entertained while dining at restaurants. Ages 6 and up. Small parts may present a choking hazard.

  • Dimensions: carrying case: 6 x 1.6 x 8 in.
  • Includes:
  •     1 24-page coloring book
  •     10 washable markers
  •     12 solid hexagon crayons
  •     Fabric carrying case with zipper closure and handle
